location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: This file consists of six memoranda.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at folio 22, and terminates at folio 23, as it is part of a larger volume; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: Memoranda providing a number of opinions regarding the British position towards the Italian occupation of Assab Bay.
